dc:title: On Pilgrimage - June 1973
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Diary-like paragraphs for the month--peace meetings, walks, reading, a visit to her daughter and grandchildren in Vermont, planting, and prayers.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 530 1973-06-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
